lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Darren Randolph has signed a new four-year contract with West Ham United, the Premier League club said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Goalkeeper Randolph Signs New Four-Year Deal at West Ham
headline.main: Goalkeeper Randolph Signs New Four-Year Deal at West Ham

snippet: Goalkeeper Darren Randolph has signed a new four-year contract with West Ham United, the Premier League club said on Sunday....
